game.name: Easy Freezy Ice Cream
game.description:
For Levy, nothing could work better to bring a big smile on her face than being participated in making ice cream for her. These days, people from various locations of the city visit her place and demand for a delicious ice cream. Are you ready to help her out in preparing ice cream in big amount? Also decorate them properly in order to make them really scrumptious. Cute Levy spends most of her time in the kitchen, so she aware of various tastiest ice cream recipes. She will be there to assist you all the time in Easy Freezy Ice Cream game. 

This beautiful girl has a wide and finest collection of recipes, which all her close friends have already tasted. For this reason, they called her a queen of preparing incredible delicious. This encouraged her to open an awesome ice cream shop where many people come to discover a huge assortment of tastes a simple and delicious scoop of ice cream can have. Your job in this free online cooking game for girls is to give your helping hand to her to prepare one of her favourite recipes. 

You will have to prepare one delicious ice cream right from the scratch. This brand new cooking game includes the proper instructions how to make the topping and the sauce. Once it is done, prepare the ice cream base and the puree. Also look into the indications on how to put it together in a cup to serve it properly to her customers. Do all the needful decoration to make it more appealing and attractive. All the best kids to have a blast in this cute girls kitchen game!
